title: (x) Me and Orson Welles Movie - Bernhard Fashion {Stephen L}
content: Sorry I don't have a sample, but all the opening credits and end credits are in a beautiful art deco type font. Anybody recognize it? Thanks
author: 666chickenhead

comments.content:
I haven't seen the movie, but in the preview the title is set in Bernhard Fashion.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202035634im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Orson_3591.jpg)

Is that the one?
No worries. Was the film any good, by the way? Any explanation given as to why the title is grammatically incorrect? Annoying. :)
